column2: If the U.S. dollar weakened by 10 as of December 31 2020 and 2021 the amount recorded in AOCI related to

column1: our foreign exchange contracts before tax effect would have been approximately 912 million and 1.3 billion lower as
of December 31 2020 and 2021 respectively. The change in the value recorded in AOCI would be expected to offset a
corresponding foreign currency change in forecasted hedged revenues when recognized.
